mapper.select: WITH up_ranked AS ( SELECT uc.u_category_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn FROM product p JOIN d_category dc ON p.d_category_id = dc.d_category_id JOIN u_category uc ON dc.u_category_id = uc.u_category_id WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY uc.u_category_name ), down_ranked AS ( SELECT dc.d_category_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn FROM product p JOIN d_category dc ON p.d_category_id = dc.d_category_id WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY dc.d_category_name ), type_ranked AS ( SELECT tc.type_category_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn FROM product p JOIN type_category tc ON p.type_category_id = tc.type_category_id WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY tc.type_category_name ) SELECT (SELECT u_category_name FROM up_ranked WHERE rn = 1) AS up_category, (SELECT d_category_name FROM down_ranked WHERE rn = 1) AS down_category, (SELECT type_category_name FROM type_ranked WHERE rn = 1) AS type_category FROM dual
